author: joeswatosh
msg: Follow on to r25068 which allows svn_client_get_mergeinfo to return NULL.
(SvnClientTest#test_merge) expect nil instead of an empty hash
(SvnClientTest#test_merge_peg) expect nil instead of an empty hash
if Svn::Client.get_mergeinfo returns nil, just return nil.

author: lgo
msg: Created new branch ra_serf-auth from trunk@25599
- add support for multiple auth handlers in ra_serf
- add ntlm support on windows (using sspi)

author: lgo
msg: Fix exit code of test that XPASSes when running tests in parallel. Also

author: lgo
msg: * subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/xml.c: Fix the 'svn:bogus date' error causing
most of the tests to fail with ra_serf by reverting r25559 and 25582.
This revert will make commit test 49 fail again with ra_serf on Windows.
